price: "Yã mutãnena! Ku shiga ƙasar nan, abar tsarkakewa, wadda Allah Ya rubuta sabõda ku, kuma kada ku kõma da bãya, har ku juya kunã mãsu hasara."
arabic: يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسَةَ ٱلَّتِي كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ وَلَا تَرۡتَدُّواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَارِكُمۡ فَتَنقَلِبُواْ خَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāqawmi ud'khulū al-arḍa al-muqadasata allatī kataba al-lahu lakum walā tartaddū ʿalā adbārikum fatanqalibū khāsirīna
